title: Apply uploaded logo and update tagline to “Protecting Structures. Preserving Values.”

requirements.text: Update the centralized business tagline in frontend/src/content/siteContent.ts to exactly: "Protecting Structures. Preserving Values." and ensure that this updated tagline is visibly rendered wherever siteContent.business.tagline is displayed (at minimum in the SiteHeader and the Home page hero).

quotes: add this as my logo and tag line as- " Protecting Structures. Preserving Values."

acceptanceCriteria: frontend/src/content/siteContent.ts has siteContent.business.tagline set to exactly "Protecting Structures. Preserving Values." (including punctuation).
The header displays the updated tagline on desktop (where the tagline is currently shown).
The Home page hero displays the updated tagline.

requirements.text: Use the user-uploaded image IMG_4371-5.PNG as the site logo and ensure the header logo renders reliably across environments (local and deployed) without falling back to the text-based placeholder.

quotes: add this as my logo and tag line as- " Protecting Structures. Preserving Values."

acceptanceCriteria: The uploaded logo image is added to the frontend static assets and is the image used by the header logo .
The SiteHeader logo image successfully loads (no broken image) and does not trigger the onError fallback in normal operation.
The logo remains crisp and properly contained within the existing header logo container at typical viewport sizes.

constraints: Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui (compose existing UI components instead).
Do not modify immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.frontend.immutablePaths.
nonGoals: Fixing or diagnosing the Caffeine build/deployment configuration error outside of code changes.
Adding new pages, routes, authentication flows, or backend features beyond the logo/tagline update.
